verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
This is the air I breathe
This is the air I breathe
Your holy presence living in me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This is my daily bread
This is my daily bread
Your very word spoken to me

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And I'm desperate for You
And I'm lost without You
